sentences.en: Cattails, dried milkweed pods, and other weeds may be gathered and painted for decorations.
sentences.cn: 有人喜欢收集香蒲属植物 、 干枯的马利筋属植物的茎荚和其他野草,将它们着色, 然后再做成装饰品.

sentences.en: In the spring, surviving monarchs fly north, stopping at fields of milkweed to lay eggs.
sentences.cn: 春天, 度过了寒冷冬天存活下来的帝王蝶飞回北方停在生长牛奶草的田野里产卵.

sentences.en: Oval milkweed somehow returned to the restored barren although it grows nowhere else in the state.
sentences.cn: 长有椭圆叶的乳草植物在这块重建的荒野恢复生长了,而在州里其它任何地方都找不到它们的影子.

sentences.en: Overall a monarch butterfly is no more or less striking than its host, the milkweed pod.
sentences.cn: 大体上,帝王蝴蝶和其宿主奶草豆荚谁也不比谁更显眼或更平庸.

sentences.en: Thank you for listening to my Milkweed.
This is because their staple food, milkweed, is being used more and more as a garden ornament.
sentences.cn: 这是因为它们的主要食物乳草被越来越多的用于园林装饰。

trans.tran_en: a common North American plant that produces a bitter white substance when its stem is broken
